title: Gorgeous One Bed in Historic Community!
map_address: East Chestnut St near Michigan Ave
posting_body: This beautiful apartment is located in the distinctive Gold Coast neighborhood of Chicago, prominently situated just steps off of Michigan Avenue.
Transformed from the renowned hotel this boutique apartment community offering timeless elegance in a contemporary setting.
Be the first to live in a newly renovated studio, one bedroom or two bedroom apartment, any of which you will be proud to call your next home.
This is a pet-friendly community offering a fitness center, free electricity, sun deck, and laundry facility for its residents.
*As a resident, you will enjoy all the conveniences that are provided just beyond your doorstep.
Whether you choose to shop, dine or stroll along the lake, your options are limitless.
